nodes.text: Star Wars: Coruscant Nights is a novel trilogy written by Michael Reaves that follows the same core group of characters in the inter-trilogy era.

The first book, Coruscant Nights I: Jedi Twilight, is set two months after Revenge of the Sith. Two books were released in 2008, and the third was released in late January 2009. A standalone followup novel called The Last Jedi, a collaboration between Reaves and Maya Kaathryn Bohnhoff, was released in February 2013. The Coruscant Nights name was originally attached to it but has since been removed.

Several characters from Reaves' and Steve Perry's MedStar books re-appear in this series, which follows Jax Pavan (Lorn Pavan's son), the droid I-5YQ, Den Dhur, Laranth Tarak, and Haninum Tyk Rhinann.
The three novels have been released by the Science Fiction Book Club as a hardback three-in-one omnibus edition.
